name: Whipped and Steamy: Cosplay Café
summary: In a town where adult media is the new best thing the Whipped and Steamy Café is the best fun for all cosplayers! "Whipped and Steamy: Cosplay Café" is a segmented visual novel with business and management simulation elements! Select the coffee of the day, the snacks, and the decoration to appeal to different groups of cosplayers! Plan to increase group interest, tips, and come up with your own strategies!
